title: Jeffrey Epstein's estate agrees to $35 million settlement for victims
summary_full: Jeffrey Epstein's estate has agreed to a substantial settlement, potentially reaching $35 million, for victims alleging abuse and trafficking. This proposed judgment covers alleged assaults spanning over two decades, from 1995 until Epstein's death in prison. The agreement, pending judicial approval, follows the release of numerous investigation documents, hinting at the vast network Epstein maintained with influential figures.
